import React from 'react' const Rating = ({value, text, color}) => { return (
= 1 ? "fa fa-star" : value >= 0.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "far fa-star-o" }> = 2 ? "fa fa-star" : value >= 1.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" }> = 3 ? "fa fa-star" : value >= 2.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" }> = 4 ? "fa fa-star" : value >= 3.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" }> = 5 ? "fa fa-star" : value >= 4.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" }> {text && text}
) } export default Rating
